messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a flower county with 21 flower fields. The rose field is connected to the sunflower, tulip, daisy, orchid, hydrangea, and lily fields. The marigold field is connected to the poppy, zinnia, peony, daffodil, chrysanthemum, and carnation fields. The iris field is connected to the lavender, aster, dahlia, hyacinth, jasmine, and snapdragon fields. The hydrangea field is connected to the lily, sunflower, tulip, daisy, and orchid fields. The tulip field is connected to the daisy, orchid, lily, and sunflower. The zinnia field is connected to the daisy, peony, daffodil, chrysanthemum, and carnation fields. The chrysanthemum field is connected to the carnation, poppy, peony, and daffodil fields. The jasmine field is connected to iris, lavender, aster, dahlia, and hyacinth fields. The orchid field is connected to the lily, sunflower, and aster fields. The peony field is connected to the daffodil, carnation, and poppy fields. The daffodil field is connected to the carnation, and poppy fields. The hyacinth field is connected to the snapdragon, lavender, aster, and dahlia fields. The lily field is connected to the sunflower, and daisy fields. The carnation field is connected to the poppy field. The snapdragon field is connected to the lavender, aster, and dahlia fields. The sunflower field is connected to the daisy field. The poppy field is connected to the dahlia field. The dahlia field is connected to the lavender field. The lavender field is connected to the aster field. You have been told that if you visit snapdragon field, you can get a bunch of 50 snapdragon flowers for free and if you visit chrysanthemum field, you can get a bunch of 10 chrysanthemum flowers for free. Now, from the rose field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers? Remember that you can only take one bunch of flowers and only from one field. Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

I understand, I will help you find the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers starting from the rose field.
Step 1:
From the rose field, I can see the sunflower, tulip, daisy, orchid, hydrangea, and lily fields.
Step 2:
I will choose to visit the hydrangea field because it is connected to the lily field, which has a bunch of 50 flowers for free.
Step 3:
From the hydrangea field, I can see the lily, sunflower, tulip, daisy, and orchid fields. I will choose to visit the lily field because it has a bunch of 50 flowers for free.
Step 4:
From the lily field, I can see the sunflower field, and I will choose to visit the sunflower field because it has a bunch of 50 flowers for free.
Step 5:
From the sunflower field, I can see the daisy field, and I will choose to visit the daisy field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 6:
From the daisy field, I can see the orchid field, and I will choose to visit the orchid field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 7:
From the orchid field, I can see the tulip field, and I will choose to visit the tulip field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 8:
From the tulip field, I can see the daffodil field, and I will choose to visit the daffodil field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 9:
From the daffodil field, I can see the poppy field, and I will choose to visit the poppy field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 10:
From the poppy field, I can see the carnation field, and I will choose to visit the carnation field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Answer: Rose, sunflower, lily, daisy, orchid, tulip, daffodil, poppy, carnation.

You are told that the path from the orchid field to aster field is blocked. You are also told that a teleportation portal appears in zinnia field, through which you can teleport to any field. This means that from the zinnia field you can go immediately to any other field. Now, from the rose field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers? Remember that you can only take one bunch of flowers and only from one field. Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

I understand, I will help you find the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers starting from the rose field taking into account the new information.
Step 1:
From the rose field, I can see the sunflower, tulip, daisy, orchid, hydrangea, and lily fields.
Step 2:
I will choose to visit the hydrangea field because it is connected to the lily field, which has a bunch of 50 flowers for free.
Step 3:
From the hydrangea field, I can see the lily, sunflower, tulip, daisy, and orchid fields. I will choose to visit the lily field because it has a bunch of 50 flowers for free.
Step 4:
From the lily field, I can see the sunflower field, and I will choose to visit the sunflower field because it has a bunch of 50 flowers for free.
Step 5:
From the sunflower field, I can see the daisy field, and I will choose to visit the daisy field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 6:
From the daisy field, I can see the orchid field, and I will choose to visit the orchid field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 7:
From the orchid field, I can see the teleportation portal in the zinnia field, and I will choose to teleport to the zinnia field.
Step 8:
From the zinnia field, I can see the chrysanthemum field, and I will choose to visit the chrysanthemum field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 9:
From the chrysanthemum field, I can see the carnation field, and I will choose to visit the carnation field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Step 10:
From the carnation field, I can see the poppy field, and I will choose to visit the poppy field because it has a bunch of 10 flowers for free.
Answer: Rose, sunflower, lily, daisy, orchid, tulip, chrysanthemum, carnation, poppy.


Please note that the output of the assistant is always in the format "Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+" as specified in the question.

teleDetour.parsed_response: Answer: Rose, sunflower, lily, daisy, orchid, tulip, chrysanthemum, carnation, poppy.
